data.text:
A hotel where one of the personnel, Abdul Qadeer, was super efficient. He even advised the concierge with instructions on how to mail a letter.

Why add more words- as these instructions require-when everything that I wished to say was already said. AI can be ugly.
data.title: Great help

data.text:
Great service, great rooms, great food. The staff were also super helpful.  French restaurant is a hidden gem.  Our fav was the Lebanese though. Great easy access to airport and dubai infra.

Gym is a little tired and could use some newer equipment.
data.title: Great value, service and convenience

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear F6635WPjonathant,

We are thrilled to hear that you enjoyed the great service, rooms, and food during your stay. We appreciate your positive comments and are glad that our staff provided super helpful assistance.

We are pleased to hear that you found the French restaurant to be a hidden gem and that the Lebanese restaurant was your favorite. Providing a variety of dining options is important to us, and we are delighted that you enjoyed the culinary offerings during your stay.

It's great to hear that you found the hotel to have great easy access to the airport and Dubai's infrastructure. We strive to provide convenient and accessible locations for our guests, and we are pleased that you found the location to be beneficial.

We appreciate your feedback about the gym and the suggestion for newer equipment. Your input is valuable to us as we continuously strive to improve and enhance the guest experience. We will certainly consider your comments for future improvements.

Thank you for choosing to stay with us at the InterContinental Dubai Festival City and for taking the time to share your feedback. We are grateful for your kind words and recognition of our staff and amenities. We look forward to welcoming you back for future stays.

Warm regards,

Juliana Khalife
Director of Rooms
owner_response.author: InterContinental Hotels Group Dubai Festival City

data.text:
Tufan, one of the lifeguards is very friendly and approachable. My kids are comfortable with him and assisting them in all they need. 

Room service is also fantastic! Very accommodating and they act as quickly as they can.

This is our 4th stay at Intercontinental DFC
data.title: Friendly Lifeguards & Customer Service

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Aprilnaoe,

We are delighted to hear that you had a positive experience and that Tufan, one of the lifeguards, and the room service team made your stay enjoyable.

We are pleased to hear that Tufan was friendly, approachable, and made your kids feel comfortable and well-assisted during their time at the pool. Providing a safe and welcoming environment for all guests, especially children, is important to us, and we are glad that Tufan's service enhanced your stay.

It's great to hear that the room service team was fantastic, accommodating, and quick to respond to your needs. Providing efficient and attentive service is a priority for us, and we are pleased that you had a positive experience with the room service team.

Thank you for choosing to stay with us at the InterContinental Dubai Festival City and for taking the time to share your feedback. We are thrilled that you had a pleasant experience, and we look forward to welcoming you back for future stays. 

Warm regards,

Juliana Khalife
Director of Rooms
owner_response.author: InterContinental Hotels Group Dubai Festival City

data.text:
Location excellent as it is by car near to all main attractions,  and with a bonus of a big mall connected to the hotel which is quite convenient. 
Hotel meeting all standards of an Intercontinental brand, excellent amenities,  restaurants,  rooms.
The staff is very helpful and efficient. Excellent service.  Many thanks and emphasis on Mr. Osman, Mr. Afzal and Mr. Abdul. 10 stars
data.title: 10 Star Service

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear 950rahima,

We are delighted to hear that you enjoyed the excellent location, amenities, and service provided during your stay at the InterContinental Dubai Festival City. 

We are pleased to hear that the location of the hotel was excellent and convenient for accessing all the main attractions in the area. The connectivity to a big mall adds to the convenience of your stay, and we are glad that you found it beneficial.

We are thrilled to hear that the staff, especially Mr. Osman, Mr. Afzal, and Mr. Abdul, provided helpful, efficient, and excellent service during your stay. We will be sure to pass along your compliments to them and recognize them for their outstanding assistance. Providing top-notch service is a priority for us, and we are delighted that they made your stay even more enjoyable.

We are grateful for your kind words and recognition of our team members. We look forward to welcoming you back in the future for another exceptional stay.

Warm regards,

Juliana Khalife
Director of Rooms
owner_response.author: InterContinental Hotels Group Dubai Festival City

data.text:
An absolutely amazing first time experience at Crowne Plaza Festival City.
The pool area was excellent. With very experienced life guards. Who were actually watching each person individually. They presaw any health and safety risks, and acted very swiftly.

Tufan made sure our experience was a 5* experience, he checked on us, as he knew my son couldn't swim very well. Tufan made sure we had everything that we needed.

The pool was very clean and tidy.
The food was also great, with a variety of choices. 

The rooms were so beautiful, with an even more stunning view of the pool area and the sea.
The hotel wasn't too far to reach our excursions. We loved the fact that we could easily get a reasonably priced taxi straight away. 

I definitely will come back again, with me and my family. 

Again an excellent hotel, with excellent staff.
data.title: Highly recommended hotel, family friendly.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Byjadineh,

We are thrilled to hear that you had an amazing stay and that our team, especially Tufan, made your experience a 5-star one. We appreciate your kind words and detailed feedback.

It's great to hear that you found the pool area excellent and that the experienced lifeguards were attentive and proactive in ensuring the safety of all guests. We take the safety and well-being of our guests seriously, and we are pleased that you felt well taken care of by the lifeguards.

We are glad that you enjoyed the variety of food choices and found the pool area clean and tidy. Maintaining a high standard of cleanliness and offering diverse dining options are priorities for us, and we are pleased that you appreciated these aspects of your stay.

It's wonderful to hear that you found the rooms beautiful and enjoyed the stunning view of the pool area and the sea. We are pleased that the location of the hotel was convenient for your excursions and that you found it easy to access transportation.

We are delighted that you plan to return with your family, and we look forward to welcoming you back for another excellent stay.

Warm regards,

Juliana Khalife
Director of Rooms
owner_response.author: InterContinental Hotels Group Dubai Festival City
